member.name: WS_XML_UTF16_TEXT
member.summary: Represents text encoded as UTF-16 bytes.

member.name: WS_XML_UTF16_TEXT.text
member.summary: The base type for all types that derive from .

member.name: WS_XML_UTF16_TEXT.bytes
member.summary: The bytes that point to UTF-16 encoded data.

member.name: WS_XML_UTF16_TEXT.byteCount
member.summary: The length in bytes of the UTF-16 encoded data.
